content.html: How the 6 Supreme Court justices can live with themselves when their single decision will destroy the lives of so many women (particularly poor women) is beyond me. I don’t believe in Hell, but since they obviously do, I hope they all burn in it for eternity.
content.value:
How the 6 Supreme Court justices can live with themselves when their single decision will destroy the lives of so many women (particularly poor women) is beyond me. 

I don’t believe in Hell, but since they obviously do, I hope they all burn in it for eternity.
